item.title: Knife remote command
item.description: Recently we switched from chef-solo to a chef-server setup on our infrastructure, a good occasion to refactor our recipes to better practices. I spent some time figuring out how to replace the fabric scripts I had for remote execution of actions on various servers, by using a knife plugin. That way I can just use knife abilities and don’t need fabric anymore. So I created a new file in .chef/plugins/knife/ named apt.
